title: Rising against the odds: Diksha Dagar
text:
If you've not seen Diksha Dagar's excellent 'drive' skills on a golf course, you certainly are missing a 'sweet spot' in life. Still in her teenage years, Dagar is one of the finest golf players of the nation. Her journey, however, is 'hole-in-one' of a kind. Dagar, who will turn 19 on December 14, 2019, is a professional deaf golfer. Coached by her father, she overcame hearing impairment to excel at the sport. Know more about her inspirational life journey in this video

Next Story : Women bikers set record with fastest Kanyakumari to Leh journey
